title: Market Price Predictor using Python
features: Designed and deployed an end‑to‑end market price prediction pipeline using ZenML, integrating data ingestion, EDA, feature engineering, and model training with scikit‑learn and XGBoost, achieving a 12% reduction in RMSE compared to baseline

Implemented comprehensive exploratory data analysis and visualization modules (univariate, bivariate, multivariate) in Jupyter notebooks, uncovering key predictive factors and informing feature selection for the Ames Housing dataset
Automated model tracking and artifact management via MLflow, generating reproducible estimator artifacts and interactive performance dashboards for stakeholder review
